data.text: Let's wrap up the training for today... Hmm?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Let's wrap up the training for today... Hmm?

data.text: What's wrong, McQueen?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>What's wrong, McQueen?

data.text: It's just... She's been staring at me for a while...
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>It's just... She's been staring at me for a while...

data.text: Ah!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Ah!

data.text: Is she acquainted with you, Trainer?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Is she acquainted with you, Trainer?

data.text: No, not really... But she's...
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>No, not really... But she's...

data.text:
Phew! Another splendid training today! Now it's time 
for my long-awaited "McQueen rolling" session!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Phew! Another splendid training today! Now it's time 
<story>for my long-awaited "McQueen rolling" session!

data.text:
Excuse me?! What in heavens is that nonsensically named 
scheme supposed to be?! I won't let you have it your way!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Excuse me?! What in heavens is that nonsensically named 
<story>scheme supposed to be?! I won't let you have it your way!

data.text: Ah! Wait, McQueen!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Ah! Wait, McQueen!

data.text:
This horsegirl... I wouldn't call her an acquaintance 
but I know her. She usually continues to train by 
herself deep into the evenings.
data.processed:
<story>This horsegirl... I wouldn't call her an acquaintance 
<story>but I know her. She usually continues to train by 
<story>herself deep into the evenings.

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text:
Today is no exception. She's still running on, 
as the only one left on the course.
data.processed:
<story>Today is no exception. She's still running on, 
<story>as the only one left on the course.

data.text: *huff huff* Whoa!!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>*huff huff* Whoa!!

data.text: *Crash!*
data.processed: <story>*Crash!*

data.text: Uff... Ouch...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Uff... Ouch...

data.text:
No matter how hard I train... 
I just can't...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>No matter how hard I train... 
<story>I just can't...

data.text:
She reminds me a lot of Mejiro McQueen 
when she was working so hard for the Tenno Sho.
data.processed:
<story>She reminds me a lot of Mejiro McQueen 
<story>when she was working so hard for the Tenno Sho.

data.text: Are you okay?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Are you okay?

data.text: Are you okay?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Are you okay?

data.text: Eh? Ah... You're... McQueen's trainer...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Eh? Ah... You're... McQueen's trainer...

data.text:
You should take it easy for the rest of today with 
your injured leg. Especially if you want to win races.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>You should take it easy for the rest of today with 
<story>your injured leg. Especially if you want to win races.

data.text:
And even if you can't go full strength right now, 
you can win. You just need to believe in yourself!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>And even if you can't go full strength right now, 
<story>you can win. You just need to believe in yourself!

data.text:
*sniffle* 
*sob*
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>*sniffle* 
<story>*sob*

data.text: Wha—?! D-Does your leg hurt that much?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Wha—?! D-Does your leg hurt that much?

data.text: Wha—?! D-Does your leg hurt that much?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Wha—?! D-Does your leg hurt that much?

data.text: N-No, that's not it...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>N-No, that's not it...

data.text:
I just love running. And yet, I've never won a race... 
But after I saw McQueen run...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>I just love running. And yet, I've never won a race... 
<story>But after I saw McQueen run...

data.text: I wanted to win, too!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>I wanted to win, too!

data.text:
For her mind to constantly dwell on the feeling 
of wanting to win... She has a lot of mental strength.
data.processed:
<story>For her mind to constantly dwell on the feeling 
<story>of wanting to win... She has a lot of mental strength.

data.text: Me, in the Derby...?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Me, in the Derby...?

data.text:
Looks like you understand now. 
I've seen you run for long enough, I'm certain of it.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Looks like you understand now. 
<story>I've seen you run for long enough, I'm certain of it.

data.text:
Looks like you understand now. 
I've seen you run for long enough, I'm certain of it.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Looks like you understand now. 
<story>I've seen you run for long enough, I'm certain of it.

data.text:
N-No way... 
I'm not nearly good enough...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>N-No way... 
<story>I'm not nearly good enough...

data.text:
I knew she'd get scared, of course. The Derby is where 
the best of the best fight over glory and honor.
data.processed:
<story>I knew she'd get scared, of course. The Derby is where 
<story>the best of the best fight over glory and honor.

data.text:
And Rice... She has the strength to able to keep up with 
Mejiro McQueen. But what's most important above all...
data.processed:
<story>And Rice... She has the strength to able to keep up with 
<story>Mejiro McQueen. But what's most important above all...

data.text: Ah...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Ah...

data.text:
A strong drive to push yourself to your limits to win. 
Which comes forth through self-confidence.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>A strong drive to push yourself to your limits to win. 
<story>Which comes forth through self-confidence.

data.text: Rice, let's work towards the Derby 'kay?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Rice, let's work towards the Derby 'kay?

data.text: Y-Yes! I will try!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Y-Yes! I will try!

data.text:
This marks the start of her all-out training. 
Let's conquer the Derby!
data.processed:
<story>This marks the start of her all-out training. 
<story>Let's conquer the Derby!

data.text: So you're saying I should keep following McQueen?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>So you're saying I should keep following McQueen?

data.text:
Correct. No matter what happens, 
try to stay following after her.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Correct. No matter what happens, 
<story>try to stay following after her.

data.text:
Correct. No matter what happens, 
try to stay following after her.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Correct. No matter what happens, 
<story>try to stay following after her.

data.text:
You'll have to face this Derby's favorite. 
The undefeated Mihono Bourbon.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>You'll have to face this Derby's favorite. 
<story>The undefeated Mihono Bourbon.

data.text:
She's a bigwig, able to run with a perfect pace. 
Almost like a machine.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>She's a bigwig, able to run with a perfect pace. 
<story>Almost like a machine.

data.text:
If you want to beat her, you'll need to be follow me 
and stay with me throughout.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>If you want to beat her, you'll need to be follow me 
<story>and stay with me throughout.

data.text: I understand. I'll try my best to follow you.
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>I understand. I'll try my best to follow you.

data.text:
Staying right behind Mejiro McQueen will require 
a lot of stamina and focus.
data.processed:
<story>Staying right behind Mejiro McQueen will require 
<story>a lot of stamina and focus.

data.text:
Rice Shower wasn't able to stay close for a while. 
But she kept persevering. Until, a few days later...
data.processed:
<story>Rice Shower wasn't able to stay close for a while. 
<story>But she kept persevering. Until, a few days later...

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text: *pant wheeze*
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>*pant wheeze*

data.text:
You done did it this time! 
You didn't fall behind at all!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>You done did it this time! 
<story>You didn't fall behind at all!

data.text: Indeed. Your stamina will be your weapon, Rice.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Indeed. Your stamina will be your weapon, Rice.

data.text: O-Okay!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>O-Okay!

data.text: A good night to everyone!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>A good night to everyone!

data.text: See ya!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>See ya!

data.text: See you tomorrow!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed: <story>See you tomorrow!

data.text: Follow... Follow...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Follow... Follow...

data.text: Follow... Follow...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Follow... Follow...

data.text: *sigh*
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>*sigh*

data.text: Follow... Follow...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Follow... Follow...

data.text: Um... Rice?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Um... Rice?

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Eh?

data.text:
Do you really want to sleep here again...? 
I would like to have a bit of privacy, you know...
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Do you really want to sleep here again...? 
<story>I would like to have a bit of privacy, you know...

data.text: But Trainer said I should follow you, no matter what...!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>But Trainer said I should follow you, no matter what...!

data.text: (That's not what they meant with that...!)
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>(That's not what they meant with that...!)

data.text:
Another few days later — The day of the Twinkle 
Series' major event, the Nippon Derby, has arrived.
data.processed:
<story>Another few days later — The day of the Twinkle 
<story>Series' major event, the Nippon Derby, has arrived.
